pullRequest.title: Simplify regex and sort colors
pullRequest.bodyText:
This slightly simplifies the regex (to avoid needing three for the different color types) since we only need the names (we don't care about what's after the = if the type on the left is some Color type, and also sorts the colors so that it's easier to se what's added removed (for ex. if the order changes in Flutter or the regexes change).
The real changes are in update_colors.dart and the others are generated as a result of that change.
